Yes, I will thank you Jill. I can mention your name, yes?
Yes.
I was born on the 29th of the 3rd 1930. I started school when I was five years old
in the Infants Junior School, Pennegallie Road.
I was in the Infants School for over two years until I became seven.
Then I was taken to Pennegallie Junior School which was only ten yards across the road from the Infants School.
I was in the Junior School until the age of eleven.
Then I was transferred to Pennegallie Road Secondary School, Cudpoith.
Yes.
I was there until I was fourteen. Unfortunately, I didn't have any education.
Otherwise, I would have gone to Wrexham Grammar School, but unfortunately I didn't qualify.
Then I had to seek work.
Yes.

Yes.
